choices.B: None of the objects are eligible for garbage collection.
choices.C: Only the object referenced by t2 is eligible for garbage collection.
choices.A: Both the objects previously referenced by t1 are eligible for garbage collection.
choices.D: Only one of the objects previously referenced by t1 is eligible for garbage collection.
